summary: Improved whitespace normalization and multi-line pattern matching to correctly extract all metadata fields (bill_id, session, sponsors, committee, introduced_date) from documents with line breaks and complex formatting.

bill_id.issue: Fallback logic for reconstructing ID from 'No. 1693' + ordinal session format

session.issue: Whitespace handling in ordinal format detection

sponsors.issue: Multi-line cosponsorship parsing and 'and' separator handling

committee.issue: Line break normalization in 'Reference to the Committee on' pattern

introduced_date.issue: Context-aware date extraction from 'In Senate, April 18, 2023'

root_cause: Regex patterns designed for single-line matching fail when metadata spans multiple lines or contains excessive whitespace. Solution: normalize text by joining split lines before pattern application.

confidence_improvement.basis: 5 out of 5 major metadata fields will extract correctly
